this is the first beatemup ive actually tried to do well in and im honestly shocked how much more there is to this game than i realized at first  the normal difficulty is a great way to familiarize yourself with your characters attacks and the enemy behaviors and the higher difficulties keep things interesting by varying the enemy spawns  each level in the campaign has something to make it unique and the combat is deceptively deep  its good

awesome revival of old school beat em up genre  series  unlocking everything through gaming as it should be no p2w stuff just good fun with many characters to fight with  music is always awesome in these games also gameplay  controls  coop is nice but could use more work or more content it gets a bit repetitive  but i suppose that is a thing with old school games like this  had some fun in the end with this game it was nice throwback into nostalgia
